1.SceneDescription: Central Perk, the whole gang is there as Joey enters

2.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, Phoebe, Monica, and Richard are there

lines.Line:
So don't, I don't see why we have to go to this thing anyway, it's yourNEWLINEex-fiancee's wedding.
NEWLINE
NEWLINERACHEL: Because I promised Mindy I would.
NEWLINE
NEWLINEMONICA: Yeah, well you promised Barry, you'd marry him. (Rachel glares at her, and sheNEWLINEretreats to safety between Richard's legs)
NEWLINE
NEWLINERACHEL: Look you guys, I have to go, I'm the Maid-of-Honor. And besides you know what INEWLINEjust need to be in a room again with these people and feel good about myself.
NEWLINE
NEWLINE(Chandler enters, sees Rachel in the dress and starts laughing)
NEWLINE
NEWLINEPHOEBE: Ooh-oh! Someone's wearing the same clothes they had on last night. Someone get aNEWLINElittle action?
NEWLINE
NEWLINECHANDLER: I may have.
NEWLINE
NEWLINEMONICA: Woo-hoo, stuud!
NEWLINE
NEWLINEROSS: What's she look like?
NEWLINE
NEWLINECHANDLER: Well, we haven't exactly met, we just stayed up all night talking on theNEWLINEinternet.
NEWLINE
NEWLINEMONICA: Woo-hoo, geeek!
NEWLINE
NEWLINECHANDLER: I like this girl, okay, I seriously like this girl, you now how sometimes I tendNEWLINEget a little defended and quipy...
NEWLINE
NEWLINEROSS: Get out!
NEWLINE
NEWLINERACHEL: Nooo!
NEWLINE
NEWLINEMONICA: Please!
NEWLINE
NEWLINECHANDLER: Well she totally called me on it, okay. She said, 'cut it out, get real', and INEWLINEdid.
NEWLINE
NEWLINERACHEL: Wow! What's that like?
NEWLINE
NEWLINECHANDLER: It's like this, me, no jokes.
NEWLINE
NEWLINEPHOEBE: All right, stop it, you're freaking me out.
NEWLINE
NEWLINERICHARD: Oh, yeah, I don't like you this way. All right, I'll see you guys later.
NEWLINE
NEWLINEALL: Bye, Richard.
NEWLINE
NEWLINEMONICA: Bye sweetie, (kisses him) I love you.
NEWLINE
NEWLINERICHARD: I love you, too.
NEWLINE
NEWLINE(Monica stares longingly at the door, after Richard leaves)
NEWLINE
NEWLINEPHOEBE: I think my boyfriend ever so dreamy, I wonder what our wedding's gonna be like.
NEWLINE
NEWLINEMONICA: What are you talking about? What wedding?
NEWLINE
NEWLINEPHOEBE: Come on, like you never talk that.
NEWLINE
NEWLINEMONICA: Nooo! Never! I mean, we're living in the moment. God, it is so nice for once toNEWLINEnot have to get all hung up on 'Where is this going?'
NEWLINE
NEWLINERACHEL: Afraid to ask him?
NEWLINE
NEWLINEMONICA: Could not be more terrified.
NEWLINE
NEWLINECHANDLER: Well, I think you should seriously consider the marriage thing, give RachelNEWLINEanother chance to dress up like Princess Bubble Yum.
NEWLINE
NEWLI

3.SceneDescription: Chandler and Joey's, Chandler, Joey, and Phoebe are there, Chandler is talking toNEWLINEhis new friend on the internet.

4.SceneDescription: later the bridesmaids and ushers are getting ready to start, Ross is looking forNEWLINERachel

5.SceneDescription: Chandler and Joey's, Phoebe, Chandler, and Joey are there, Joey is on theNEWLINEphone.

6.SceneDescription: later, Richard and Monica are dancing

7.SceneDescription: Chandler and Joey's, Joey is reading a script as Ross enters
